content: my go to accessory from fall to spring is this classy cowl that i wear over my t-shirt as soon as the first fall chilly evening appears and under my coat throughout the winter i can not rave enough about this simple cable design and the understated estonian braid and lovely i-cord edging you can also choose to omit the i-cord edging for a rib instruction included in the pattern gauge for pattern is worked flat r1 k6 p2 k6 p2 k6 r2 p6 k2 p6 k2 p6 worked for 20 row unblocked piece measures neck 9 inches/23cm bobble edge 22 inches/56cm length 12 inches/30 5cm
